channel.title: SuperTest on Nao's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in SuperTest on Nao's Blog

item.title: SuperTest Tutorial Advance Usage - Multiple Environment Support
item.description: Configure multiple environments for API testing with SuperTest ðŸ“„ Test Configuration Files Create and edit test configuration files for different environments ðŸ“„ Test Data Files Create and edit test data files for different environments ðŸ“„ Update Test Cases Update test cases to support multiple environments

item.title: SuperTest Tutorial Advance Usage - Data Driven
item.description: advanced usage of Supertest, focusing on data-driven testing. You will learn how to extend and optimize your Supertest test suite with data parameterization to improve test coverage.

item.title: SuperTest Tutorial: Advanced Usage - Common Assertions
item.description: This blog focuses on advanced usage of Supertest, with a particular focus on commonly used assertions.

item.title: SuperTest Tutorial: Advanced Usage - Integration CI CD and Github action
item.description: dive into advanced usage of Supertest, focusing on how to integrate Supertest into a CI/CD process and how to automate tests using GitHub Actions.

item.title: SuperTest Tutorial: Building a Supertest API Automation Test project from 0 to 1
item.description: dive into how to build a Supertest API automation testing project from scratch.Supertest is a popular Java library for performing REST API testing, providing powerful tools that make it easy to write automated test scripts to validate the API’sbehavior.

item.title: SuperTest Tutorial: Getting Started and Setting Up Your Environment
item.description: a tutorial on Supertest, focusing on getting started and preparing the environment to be built.
